title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 673.9 - Notification of auxiliary spillway flow
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 673.9 - Notification of auxiliary spillway flow

State Regulations

The owner of a dam that has been assigned a hazard
classification of class B or C shall notify the department in writing, in a
format acceptable to the department, within five calendar days of any flow in
an erodible auxiliary spillway. The department may require additional
information to be submitted in order to protect public safety, property or
natural resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

673.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
